text:
sir
     
  I would much appreciate if you help me in finding the problem
   
  My error logs says as reads below
   
  The system cannot find the path specified : couldn't create child 
processes: 720003:firs.pl
   
  The system cannot find the path specified : couldn't spawn processes: 
c:\programfiles\apahce2\cgi-bin\first.pl
   
  Kindly help me to get this problem solved
   
  regards
  mani

This does not seem to be a bug. Please post your question on the users support
list (http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html) since bugzilla is not support
forum, but for reporting bugs.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
